PROFILE  
 
Accomplished metals & mining research analyst, with successful experience building, 
maintaining and furthering product offerings for clients. Confident communicator 
with international conference and client management involvement alongside strong 
internal team leadership.

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
